LABEL: 0x31D
STRING: 「...giri-san!」

LABEL: 0x339
STRING: 「Katagiri-san!」

LABEL: 0x40F
STRING: I feel uncomfortable, as if I've been forcibly awakened from a distant sleep.

LABEL: 0x45F
STRING: The place I picture in my mind where I should be doesn't match the way I feel.

LABEL: 0x4A9
STRING: My brain confuses the difference between the two, and the result is an intoxicating feeling like seasickness.

LABEL: 0x4F5
STRING: 「Are you alright?」

LABEL: 0x531
STRING: I blink my eyes a few times to regain my vision.

LABEL: 0x563
STRING: Surprised and confused, my senses once again perceive a white room.

LABEL: 0x5A1
STRING: And――I understand.

LABEL: 0x5C3
STRING: It's as if a record has stopped playing.

LABEL: 0x5EF
STRING: The record of the "first day" is over.

LABEL: 0x621
STRING: 「You must not be used to this yet.」

LABEL: 0x653
STRING: 「It may be uncomfortable, so calm down first.」

LABEL: 0x6A3
STRING: I breathe in and out like "she" tells me.

LABEL: 0x6DD
STRING: The sensation of my own chest rising and falling feels awfully vivid.

LABEL: 0x723
STRING: Yes, this is real.

LABEL: 0x74F
STRING: It's not 2033 anymore.

LABEL: 0x779
STRING: 「How was it, your recollection?」

LABEL: 0x7A9
STRING: Unable to answer immediately, I'm at a loss for words.

LABEL: 0x7D7
STRING: I was prepared for this, of course, but what I witnessed were... gut-wrenching images.

LABEL: 0x81D
STRING: Frozen limbs, scattered in the sea.

LABEL: 0x8BB
STRING: 「Many people lost their lives――」

LABEL: 0x8E5
STRING: Dozens of lives snuffed out in an instant.

LABEL: 0x917
STRING: ――As I already know.

LABEL: 0x93B
STRING: 「It's... sad.」

LABEL: 0x959
STRING: My honest impression naturally comes out of my mouth.

LABEL: 0x985
STRING: 「What is it that you find sad?」

LABEL: 0x9AD
STRING: 「The fact that I can't remember the voices of all those people whose lives were taken in an instant, none of them.」

LABEL: 0xA05
STRING: No, "she" says.

LABEL: 0xA2D
STRING: 「It's not that you can't remember.」

LABEL: 0xA5B
STRING: 「It's that you don't know.」

LABEL: 0xA7D
STRING: 「After all, they were people unrelated to you, weren't they?」

LABEL: 0xABD
STRING: "Unrelated" sounds dismissive.

LABEL: 0xAE9
STRING: 「Even if they were... no, because they were unrelated...」

LABEL: 0xB21
STRING: We didn't know anything about each other at that point, and there was no way to tell what the future might have brought.

LABEL: 0xB85
STRING: 「It's just... sad.」

LABEL: 0xBA9
STRING: And now... that tragedy is being repeated again inside the recreation.

LABEL: 0xBF7
STRING: A tragedy is unfolding before my eyes once more, just as I remember seeing it somewhere.

LABEL: 0xC9A
STRING: Why can't it be changed?

LABEL: 0xCC8
STRING: Why――

LABEL: 0xCE2
STRING: 「Katagiri-san, please don't blame yourself. This was something that could not be prevented.」

LABEL: 0xD34
STRING: "Her" voice keeps back the thoughts swirling inside my head.

LABEL: 0xE0C
STRING: 「Once a program has been altered, it will only return one output under fixed conditions.」

LABEL: 0xE70
STRING: 「After the ship set sail on August 1st, there was no turning back.」

LABEL: 0xEDC
STRING: No matter what choices I make, the sinking can't be avoided.

LABEL: 0xF1E
STRING: The plan is already in motion.

LABEL: 0xF52
STRING: 「You've probably heard about the trolley problem.」

LABEL: 0xF94
STRING: 「You decide how many people will be killed by your choice.」

LABEL: 0xFE2
STRING: 「But, you can't go back to before the trolley starts moving.」

LABEL: 0x1028
STRING: It's... a solution outside the definition.

LABEL: 0x1050
STRING: ――"The trolley that started moving never existed from the start."

LABEL: 0x1094
STRING: Such an answer that overturns the premise is not allowed.

LABEL: 0x10CC
STRING: 「In other words, it's like that.」

LABEL: 0x10F6
STRING: 「Your choices will force you to interpret and reflect on the coming events in different ways.」

LABEL: 0x1154
STRING: 「But not all of it is your responsibility.」

LABEL: 0x1194
STRING: 「Never forget that.」

LABEL: 0x11C6
STRING: "Her" words are gentle.

LABEL: 0x11EC
STRING: But, is that really true?

LABEL: 0x121E
STRING: While knowing all the outcomes, if you can't avoid them...

LABEL: 0x126C
STRING: 「――There are yet more painful records ahead for you.」

LABEL: 0x12BA
STRING: 「Even so, do you still wish to continue?」

LABEL: 0x12E2
STRING: A moment of hesitation.

LABEL: 0x12FE
STRING: But I know the answer.

LABEL: 0x1328
STRING: 「...Of course.」

LABEL: 0x134A
STRING: I have to see this through to the end.

LABEL: 0x1376
STRING: Even if I'm not responsible for every choice, for every outcome...

LABEL: 0x13C0
STRING: Now that I've started, I have a responsibility to see it through to the end.

LABEL: 0x13F8
STRING: So I have to aim for the best outcome.

LABEL: 0x142E
STRING: I mustn't give up and abandon this halfway.

LABEL: 0x14CA
STRING: 「From here on, Katagiri-san...」

LABEL: 0x14F6
STRING: 「...There are still survivors.」

LABEL: 0x1518
STRING: 「The story for you truly begins from here.」

LABEL: 0x155C
STRING: I wonder why.

LABEL: 0x1578
STRING: ...For a moment, I feel a sense of hopelessness.

LABEL: 0x15A8
STRING: A feeling that the story that awaits me is a disturbing one.

LABEL: 0x15E4
STRING: I shake it off as just my imagination.

LABEL: 0x160A
STRING: 「Now, let's go back in time.」

LABEL: 0x1634
STRING: August 2nd.

LABEL: 0x164A
STRING: The record goes back to the day when a new story was set in motion.
